Articles.Content:
Hellos all,

I've been a long time player of Kerbal Space Program (Since early beta), but I've only now just decided to join these forums.

Although I've been playing it for a while, my orbits are still absolutely abysmal! Took me hundreds of attempts to get two pieces of my space station to finally meet up!

I've been planning a few attempts at some of the challenges, so I will probably be posting a few logs about them.

Thank you for your time, and I'll hopefully see you around the forums!
Congratulations on your first station! And remember: once you're in orbit, you're halfway to anywhere ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Good luck! I can't station, the parts make my Mac smoke ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Welcome!

Hey Adamczuk and welcome to the forums!!

Congratulations on your first station! Paralleling with what Ravenchant said, just think of all the places you can go now!

All the best and I too hope to see you around.

Thank you everyone for the kind words.

I think with orbits, the more practice you have with them, the easier they become (Well... hopefully!).
